content.overview: We developed a comprehensive Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) system that seamlessly integrates ERPNext's powerful backend with a modern React-based frontend. This solution transforms traditional ERP workflows into intuitive, user-friendly experiences while maintaining enterprise-grade functionality.

Real-time Data Synchronization between frontend and ERPNext backend
